column13: Solovoga Cefort Flats Price: Rs.1330

column1: The blue embodiment of this pair of Cefort flats from Solovoga gives your feet a feminine side with the flower detail in the front
column2: while still retaining a casual appearance with its elastic ankle strap. Team it with black skinny jeans or denim skirts.
